sys_script.name: Day Hrs Range Between 0 and 24

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_dd4d298e1b7a4010f59b8734ec4bcb4a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_timesheet</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Day Hrs Range Between 0 and 24</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var week = ['mon', 'tue', 'wed', 'thu', 'fri', 'sat', 'sun'];
	var error, hrs;
	for (var w in week) {
		hrs = current.getValue(week[w]);
		if (hrs == undefined || (hrs < 0 || hrs > 24)) {
			error = 'In current timesheet, "'+week[w]+'" must contains a valid day hour value (0-24) but it contains '+hrs;
			if (current.state == 'Open')
				gs.addInfoMessage(error);
			else {
				gs.addErrorMessage(error);
				current.setAbortAction(true);
			}
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MANUJAG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-07 16:57:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>dd4d298e1b7a4010f59b8734ec4bcb4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Day Hrs Range Between 0 and 24</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NBSE Time Card" source="x_nyk_nbse_time_ca">00e16545dbf604901a9df77c2996198a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NBSE Time Card">00e16545dbf604901a9df77c2996198a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_dd4d298e1b7a4010f59b8734ec4bcb4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MANUJAG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-07 16:57:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
